name: Parking Business
description:
When Jim father died he left him a Parking Businesses all over town, Jim’s uncle took the business and kept it! Years later Jim is a young man and he wants his business back!
Help Jim to reclaim his Parking Business, he needs to prove that he can park any where under any conditions.

How to play:
Adjust the take off ramp
Drag the car back then release it to let it fly to its target
The power of the take off is proportional to your dragging distance
Once you are airborne your can speed up by touching the screen in front of the car or slow it down touching behind the car.

Features
Keep track of how many cars you crash on the leaderboard
Collect coins of purchase them to change your car or buy more attempts

Join our Facebook page for tips and tricks and update about upcoming versions!
See our developer website
